attributes.additional_details:
When I was a youngster I had great respect for others and the law, you needn't worry about locking your front door in most towns. Now it is clear to me and many others that the Justice system in our country is no longer fit for duty. A major shake up is needed concerning the softness of punishments being awarded to criminals ranging from petty shop lifting to murder and anything in-between.

Certain people of today do not care for the law as it is a joke to them, let us change this and restore our broken country to it's former pride.
